name: FrappyCrow
description:
My Ludum Dare 49 Game "Frappy Clow"!!

Made in 48 hours by myself.

--Control arrow -> move z -> jump x -> parry, reflection --

# Tips: After Second Heart, you Need to Parry.

Enjoy!!

Please visit LudumDare site, to rate and comment!!
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/$269851

If you like this game, please support me from itch.io or ko-fi!!!!
